item.description:
The Department of Conservation and Recreation (DCR) will hold the final public meeting to discuss the draft of the Resource Management Plan (RMP) for MSSF on Wednesday, May 25 at the Main Plymouth Public Library. The Plan will guide future preservation and stewardship efforts in the Forest, and will ensure consistency between recreational uses and protection of natural resources.  After the Draft is released, the public will have 60 days to submit comments. Please check the Friends of MSSF website after 5/25 for a link to the Draft and information on how to submit your comments.

Your input is important to the process! Thank you to everyone who participated in the five workshops hosted by Friends of MSSF. Please attend the final DCR public meeting and participate in the discussion on behalf of MSSF.

More about the Pulbic Meeting

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: DCR Public Meeting to Discuss the MSSF Resource Management Plan Draft
